obfuscation: I am the last person to insult a British sailor , Sir Joseph .
original: I am the last person to insult a British sailor, Sir Joseph.

obfuscation: You are the last person who did , Captain Corcoran .
original: You are the last person who did, Captain Corcoran.

obfuscation: Desire that splendid seaman to step forward .
original:
Desire
that splendid seaman to step forward.

obfuscation: No , no , the other splendid seaman .
original: No, no, the other splendid seaman.

obfuscation: Ralph Rackstraw , three paces to the front -- march !
original: Ralph Rackstraw, three paces to the front--march!

obfuscation: I beg your pardon -- I do n't think I understand you .
original: I beg your pardon--I don't think I understand you.

obfuscation: And a first-rate seaman , I 'll be bound .
original: And a first-rate seaman, I'll be bound.

obfuscation: There 's not a smarter topman in the Navy , your honour , though I say it who should n't .
original:
There's not a smarter topman in the Navy, your honour, though I
 say it who shouldn't.

obfuscation: That 's a pity : all sailors should dance hornpipes .
original: That's a pity: all sailors should dance hornpipes.

obfuscation: I will teach you one this evening , after dinner .
original:
I will
  teach you one this evening, after dinner.

obfuscation: Now tell me -- make n't be afraid -- how does your captain treat you , eh ?
original:
Now tell me--don't be
  afraid-- how does your captain treat you, eh?

obfuscation: A better captain make n't walk the deck , your honour .
original: A better captain don't walk the deck, your honour.

obfuscation: I like to hear you speak well of your commanding officer ; I daresay he do n't deserve it , but still it does you credit .
original:
I like to hear you speak well of your commanding
  officer; I daresay he don't deserve it, but still it does you
  credit.

obfuscation: I can hum a small , your honour .
original: I can hum a little, your honour.

obfuscation: Then hum this at your leisure .
original: Then hum this at your leisure.

obfuscation: It is a song that I have composed for the use of the Royal Navy .
original: It is a song that I have composed for the use of the Royal Navy.

obfuscation: It is designed to encourage independence of thought and action in the lower branches of the service , and to teach the principle that a British sailor is any man 's equal , excepting mine .
original:
It is designed to encourage independence of thought and action in the
 lower branches of the service, and to teach the principle that a  British sailor
  is any man's equal, excepting mine.

obfuscation: Now , Captain Corcoran , a word with you in your cabin , on a bid and sentimental subject .
original:
Now, Captain Corcoran, a word with
  you in your cabin, on a tender and sentimental subject.

obfuscation: Aye , aye , Sir Joseph Boatswain , in commemoration of this joyous occasion , see that extra grog is served out to the ship 's company at seven bells .
original:
Aye, aye,

    Sir Joseph Boatswain, in commemoration of this joyous
  occasion, see that extra grog is served out to the ship's company
  at seven bells.

obfuscation: I do n't think I understand you .
original: I don't think I understand you.
